original_text: And he had prepared for him a great chamber, where aforetime they laid the meat offerings, the frankincense, and the vessels, and the tithes of the corn, the new wine, and the oil, which was commanded to be given to the Levites, and the singers, and the porters; and the offerings of the priests.
korean_text: 도비야를 위하여 한 큰 방을 만들었으니 그 방은 원래 소제물과 유향과 그릇과 또 레위 사람들과 노래하는 자들과 문지기들에게 십일조로 주는 곡물과 새 포도주와 기름과 또 제사장들에게 주는 거제물을 두는 곳이라

sentences.original_text: And he had prepared for him a great chamber
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그를 위해 큰 방을 마련했으며

sentences.original_text: where aforetime they laid the meat offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 예전에 그들이 소제물을 두었던 곳이며

sentences.original_text: and the tithes of the corn
the new wine, and the oil
which was commanded to be given to the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 레위 사람들에게 주라고 명령받은 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the singers, and the porters
and the offerings of the priests
